snippet.title: Introducing Trolley Problem, Inc.
snippet.description:
Trolley Company, Inc. is a darkly comedic narrative game based on real world philosophical papers, in which you are asked to make a series of impossible choices from two awful answers. Wrestle with your moral compass, decide the fate of millions – and compare your choices with the rest of the world.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1582680/
